modName: Categorized Favorites Menu - Russian Text Fix
summary: Fixes working with russian game text encodings in Categorized Favorites Menu. Also SKSE plugin can be used fox fix russian encodings in other mods.
descriptionHtml:
In official CFM 1.8.2 russian fix included, this fix no need more for CFM, use original version. Only source files can be downloaded.
Please dont forget add [config] parameter \"fix_russian = true\" to your config!
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Original Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder[/url]

[b]Requirements:[/b]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org]The Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE), Version 1.4.2 (or newer)[/url].

[b]See also:[/b]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5468]Russian config[/url]

[b]ChangeLog:[/b]
1.2:
- Fix working with strange game versions(may be pirate)
1.0:
- Initial version
author: V10
